nodes.text: The Nikardun utilized a class of blockade frigate during their conquests. The Chiss warship Springhawk captured one such frigate.

Later, the Paccosh subclan leader named Uingali foar Marocsaa captured such a frigate from Nikardun forces fleeing the Rapacc system. He decorated the surface of his captured blockade frigate with a chimaera.
